addr: Paramount Studios. 5555 Melrose Ave.. Los Angeles, CA 90038
title: IDA Documentary Awards 2015
desc: The IDA Documentary Awards is the foremost event dedicated to the art of documentary film, honoring individuals for outstanding achievements and contributions to the field, as well as the best documentary films and nonfiction series of the year. Winners of the 31st Annual IDA Documentary Awards will be announced on  Saturday, December 5, 2015 ?in Los Angeles at the Paramount Theater. Hosted by  Tig Notaro . See all awards  honorees  and  nominees ?and find us on  Twitter  to learn more. APPLY MEMBER DISCOUNT       Join the IDA now!  For discounted admission prices and more! IDA members decide the winners in the Best Feature category and in the Best Short category of the IDA Documentary Awards. Current IDA members who meet our judging requirements will be able to view the nominated films and cast their votes online from anywhere in the world.  Begin the voting process now! Not an IDA member?  Join the IDA today.
